title: 【3.10.2.0更新】衣服附在布娃娃上。
author: Yihc
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Yihc 于 2015-5-13 15:02 编辑 

3.10.2.0 更新内容
社区公告 - Nelson Sexton




哈喽~~


如果你对正在测试版本的Unturned感兴趣!你可以打开你的Steam游戏库右击Unturned, 选择属性, 找到“测试”的选项卡并且输入代码"OPERATIONMAPLELEAF". 

添加: 
添加了绘制距离和网格质量。在暂停界面添加了配置选项。添加了效果影响(effect quality)会影响到布娃娃血迹弹壳多久消失。添加了布娃娃会穿着衣服[有利有弊?]。

改正/改进: 
改正了菜单比例和连接服务器/单人的时候的警报系统(译者:我觉得作者的意思是反作弊)。改正了衣服的性能。改正了键盘绑定系统。

调整: 
调整了灵敏度1.0——10.0，使玩家更有选择空间

修复: 
修复了修复hitmarker会完全修复完毕(译者:我并不知道hitmarker是什么东西,有人知道麻烦说一下)。修复了hitmarker攻击废车(依旧意义不明)。修复了戴眼镜的时候游戏崩溃。修复了多人模式下捡物品的问题。修复了死后服装问题(上次更新有到)。修复了在客户端的布娃娃问题。修复了泡泡/云的消失。修复了开灯后屏幕的问题(不明白这是什么错误)。修复了回档的错误




原文：
Hello! 

If you're interested in testing out this upcoming update head on over to the Preview branch! You can gain access by right clicking on Unturned in your Steam library, selecting properties, navigating to the Betas tab and entering the secret passcode "OPERATIONMAPLELEAF". 

Additions: 
Added direct correlation between draw distance and mesh quality as separating them proved confusing for most players.Added configuration in the in-game pause menu.Added effect quality which impacts how long ragdolls, bullet holes, blood splatters, etc last before despawning.Added ragdoll to wear clothing. [Is this good or bad?]

Improvements: 
Improved menu scaling and alert system for connecting, etc.Improved clothing performance.Improved keybinding system.

Tweaks: 
Tweaked sensitivity to have a value 1.0 - 10.0 to make more sense.

Fixes: 
Fixed repair hitmarker when fully healed.Fixed attack hitmarker against dead vehicles.Fixed crash when wearing glasses.Fixed bug picking up items in multiplayer.Fixed visual clothes to turn on after death.Fixed own ragdoll on client.Fixed bubbles/clouds disappearing.Fixed lighting loading after screen.Fixed incorrect inventory callback.



有错误请指出
